description.en:
AstroSanta - Auto-generating liquidity protocol / Static farming - Play2earn - NFT

AstroSanta combines the power of reasonable buy and sell taxes for the BSC space! 
Having portions of each transaction added to liquidity ensures less price volatility whereas the manual buyback is used to create bullish momentum or defend key support areas.

Holders earn passive rewards through static reflection as they watch their balance of AstroSanta grow indefinitely. Our tokenomics incentivize holding.
